import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{toast}from'react-toastify';import{FaBarcode,FaToggleOn,FaToggleOff,FaTrash,FaSync,FaInfoCircle,FaExclamationTriangle}from'react-icons/fa';import{counterSync}from'../services/CounterSyncService';import{eventBus}from'../services/ToastManager';import'./BarcodeScanner.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BarcodeScanner=_ref=>{let{offlineQueue,onUpdate}=_ref;// üéØ TEK KAYNAKLI DURUM MODELƒ∞ - 4 Ana State
const[offline,setOffline]=useState(false);// Her zaman false - sadece online mod
const[Q,setQ]=useState(0);// kuyruk: tamsayƒ±
const[P,setP]=useState(0);// i≈üleniyor: tamsayƒ±
const[T,setT]=useState(0);// toplam: tamsayƒ±
// Appium durumu kontrol√º
const[appiumConnected,setAppiumConnected]=useState(false);const[isProcessing,setIsProcessing]=useState(false);// Yardƒ±mcƒ± state (UI i√ßin)
const[queueItems,setQueueItems]=useState([]);const[showClearModal,setShowClearModal]=useState(false);// Debounce koruma - 300ms
const[lastActionTime,setLastActionTime]=useState(0);const DEBOUNCE_DELAY=300;const testBarcodes=[{code:'ULD-AKE12345AB',type:'ULD',valid:true},{code:'123-45678901',type:'AWB',valid:true},{code:'ULD-ABC123',type:'ULD',valid:false},{code:'INVALID-CODE',type:'INVALID',valid:false}];// Appium saƒülƒ±k kontrol√º
const checkAppiumHealth=async()=>{try{// Timeout ve retry ile Appium kontrol√º
const controller=new AbortController();const timeoutId=setTimeout(()=>controller.abort(),3000);// 3 saniye timeout
const response=await fetch('http://10.0.2.2:4723/wd/hub/status',{signal:controller.signal,method:'GET',headers:{'Accept':'application/json'}});clearTimeout(timeoutId);const isConnected=response.ok;setAppiumConnected(isConnected);if(!isConnected){eventBus.emit('appium:missing');}return isConnected;}catch(error){console.log('Appium baƒülantƒ± hatasƒ±:',error.message);setAppiumConnected(false);eventBus.emit('appium:missing');return false;}};// Retry mekanizmasƒ± ile Appium kontrol√º
const checkAppiumWithRetry=async function(){let retries=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:3;for(let i=0;i<retries;i++){const connected=await checkAppiumHealth();if(connected){return true;}if(i<retries-1){console.log("Appium retry ".concat(i+1,"/").concat(retries,"..."));await new Promise(resolve=>setTimeout(resolve,1000));// 1 saniye bekle
}}return false;};// Debounce check fonksiyonu
const checkDebounce=()=>{const now=Date.now();if(now-lastActionTime<DEBOUNCE_DELAY){console.log('‚ö†Ô∏è Debounced - √ßok hƒ±zlƒ± tƒ±klama');return false;}setLastActionTime(now);return true;};// Aksiyon logu helper
const logAction=(action,before,after)=>{console.log("".concat(action,": \xF6nce Q=").concat(before.Q,",P=").concat(before.P,",T=").concat(before.T,", offline=").concat(before.offline," \u2192 sonra Q=").concat(after.Q,",P=").concat(after.P,",T=").concat(after.T,", offline=").concat(after.offline));};// Buton durumlarƒ± hesaplama - BASƒ∞T MANTIK
const getButtonStates=()=>{const isAppiumConnected=appiumConnected;const isProcessingState=isProcessing||P>0;const hasQueue=Number(Q)>0;// String kontrol√º
const isOffline=offline;// Debug deƒüerleri ekrana yazdƒ±r
console.log('üîç DEBUG:',{Appium:isAppiumConnected?'‚úì':'√ó',Offline:isOffline?'‚úì':'√ó',Kuyruk:Q,Processing:isProcessingState?'‚úì':'√ó'});return{scanButton:{disabled:!isAppiumConnected||isProcessingState,tooltip:!isAppiumConnected?'Appium baƒülƒ± deƒüil':isProcessingState?'ƒ∞≈ülem devam ediyor':'Barkod tara/oku'},processButton:{disabled:!isAppiumConnected||isProcessingState||!isOffline||!hasQueue,tooltip:!isAppiumConnected?'Appium baƒülƒ± deƒüil':isProcessingState?'ƒ∞≈ülem devam ediyor':!isOffline?'Online modda kuyruk i≈ülemesi yok':!hasQueue?'Kuyruk bo≈ü':'Kuyruƒüu i≈üle'},clearButton:{disabled:!isAppiumConnected||isProcessingState||!isOffline||!hasQueue,tooltip:!isAppiumConnected?'Appium baƒülƒ± deƒüil':isProcessingState?'ƒ∞≈ülem devam ediyor':!isOffline?'Online modda kuyruk i≈ülemesi yok':!hasQueue?'Kuyruk bo≈ü':'Kuyruƒüu temizle'}};};// Appium saƒülƒ±k kontrol√º ba≈ülatma
useEffect(()=>{// ƒ∞lk kontrol retry ile
checkAppiumWithRetry();// Her 5 saniyede bir Appium durumunu kontrol et
const interval=setInterval(()=>{checkAppiumWithRetry();},5000);return()=>clearInterval(interval);},[]);// Kuyruƒüu temizle
const handleClearQueue=()=>{if(!checkDebounce())return;// Offline mod kontrol√º
if(!offline){console.log('üö´ Kuyruƒüu Temizle blocked: online mode');return;}if(Q===0){eventBus.emit('queue:empty');return;}const before={Q,P,T,offline};setQ(0);setQueueItems([]);const after={Q:0,P,T,offline};logAction('CLEAR_QUEUE',before,after);eventBus.emit('queue:cleared',{count:Q});};// Toggle fonksiyonu kaldƒ±rƒ±ldƒ± - sadece online mod
// Mobil testini bitir
const handleMobileTestComplete=async()=>{if(!checkDebounce())return;console.log("\uD83D\uDD04 Mobil Testini Bitir clicked: T=".concat(T));try{// URL'den runId'yi al
const urlParams=new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);const runId=urlParams.get('runId');if(!runId){toast.error('‚ùå RunId bulunamadƒ±');return;}// Backend'e mobil test tamamlandƒ± isteƒüi g√∂nder
const response=await fetch('http://localhost:3001/api/mobile-test-completed',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({runId:runId,results:{passed:T,// Toplam ba≈üarƒ±lƒ± barkod sayƒ±sƒ±
failed:0,// ≈ûimdilik 0, ger√ßek uygulamada hesaplanabilir
total:T}})});if(response.ok){console.log('‚úÖ Mobil test tamamlandƒ± bildirildi');// 2 saniye sonra sayfayƒ± yenile (opsiyonel)
setTimeout(()=>{window.location.reload();},2000);}else{throw new Error('Backend hatasƒ±');}}catch(error){console.error('‚ùå Mobil test tamamlandƒ± hatasƒ±:',error);toast.error('‚ùå Test tamamlandƒ± bildirilemedi');}};// üîÑ 2) Barkod Tara / Oku
const simulateScan=async barcode=>{if(!checkDebounce())return;// Appium kontrol√º
if(!appiumConnected){eventBus.emit('appium:missing');return;}console.log("\uD83D\uDD04 Barkod Tara clicked: offline=".concat(offline,", Q=").concat(Q,", P=").concat(P,", T=").concat(T,", barcode=").concat((barcode===null||barcode===void 0?void 0:barcode.code)||'manual'));const before={Q,P,T,offline};// Offline modda kuyruƒüa ekle
if(offline){const newQ=Q+1;setQ(newQ);setQueueItems(prev=>[...prev,{id:Date.now(),code:(barcode===null||barcode===void 0?void 0:barcode.code)||'TEST-12345',timestamp:new Date()}]);const after={Q:newQ,P,T,offline};logAction('Barkod Kuyruƒüa Eklendi',before,after);eventBus.emit('queue:add');return;}// Online modda direkt i≈üle
// ƒ∞≈ülem kilidi
setIsProcessing(true);setP(1);const afterStart={Q,P:1,T,offline};logAction('Barkod Tara (Online) - Ba≈üladƒ±',before,afterStart);try{// Test barkodu yoksa varsayƒ±lan olu≈ütur
const testBarcode=barcode||{code:'TEST-12345',valid:true};// Sim√ºlasyon - i≈üleme s√ºresi (1000ms)
await new Promise(resolve=>setTimeout(resolve,1000));// Sonuca g√∂re:
if(testBarcode.valid){// Ba≈üarƒ±lƒ±: T = T + 1
const newT=T+1;setT(newT);add24hTotal(1);const afterSuccess={Q,P:0,T:newT,offline};setP(0);// P = 0 (i≈ülem bitti)
setIsProcessing(false);// ƒ∞≈ülem kilidi kaldƒ±r
logAction('Barkod Tara (Online) - Ba≈üarƒ±lƒ±',afterStart,afterSuccess);// 150-300ms g√∂r√ºn√ºr tutma i√ßin toast'ƒ± geciktir
setTimeout(()=>{toast.success("\u2705 Barkod i\u015Flendi (T=".concat(newT,")"));eventBus.emit('barcode:ok',{code:testBarcode.code});},200);}else{// Ba≈üarƒ±sƒ±z: T deƒüi≈ümez
setP(0);// P = 0 (i≈ülem bitti)
setIsProcessing(false);// ƒ∞≈ülem kilidi kaldƒ±r
const afterFailed={Q,P:0,T,offline};logAction('Barkod Tara (Online) - Ba≈üarƒ±sƒ±z',afterStart,afterFailed);setTimeout(()=>{toast.error('‚ùå ƒ∞≈ülem ba≈üarƒ±sƒ±z');eventBus.emit('barcode:fail');},200);}}catch(error){// Hata durumu: P = 0, T deƒüi≈ümez
setP(0);setIsProcessing(false);// ƒ∞≈ülem kilidi kaldƒ±r
toast.error('‚ùå ƒ∞≈ülem hatasƒ±');}};// üîÑ 3) Kuyruƒüu ƒ∞≈üle (yalnƒ±z offline ve Q>0 iken)
const processQueue=async()=>{if(!checkDebounce())return;// Appium kontrol√º
if(!appiumConnected){eventBus.emit('appium:missing');return;}// Offline mod kontrol√º
if(!offline){console.log('üö´ Kuyruƒüu ƒ∞≈üle blocked: online mode');return;}console.log("\uD83D\uDD04 Kuyru\u011Fu \u0130\u015Fle clicked: offline=".concat(offline,", Q=").concat(Q,", P=").concat(P,", T=").concat(T));if(Q===0){eventBus.emit('queue:empty');return;}const before={Q,P,T,offline};const batchSize=5;let currentQ=Q;let currentT=T;// ƒ∞≈ülem kilidi
setIsProcessing(true);setP(1);try{// Batch'ler halinde i≈üle
while(currentQ>0){// Parti ba≈üƒ±: P = min(Q, batchSize)
const currentBatchSize=Math.min(currentQ,batchSize);setP(currentBatchSize);console.log("\u26A1 Batch ba\u015Flad\u0131: P=".concat(currentBatchSize,", Q=").concat(currentQ));// Sim√ºlasyon - batch i≈üleme s√ºresi
await new Promise(resolve=>setTimeout(resolve,2000));// Her √∂ƒüe tamamlandƒ±k√ßa (sim√ºlasyon %85 ba≈üarƒ±)
const successCount=Math.floor(currentBatchSize*0.85)||Math.min(1,currentBatchSize);for(let i=0;i<currentBatchSize;i++){if(i<successCount){// Ba≈üarƒ±lƒ±: T = T + 1, Q = Q - 1, P = P - 1
currentT++;setT(currentT);add24hTotal(1);}// Her durumda: Q = Q - 1, P = P - 1
currentQ--;setQ(currentQ);setP(Math.max(0,currentBatchSize-i-1));// Kƒ±sa gecikme (UI'da deƒüi≈üimi g√∂rmek i√ßin)
await new Promise(resolve=>setTimeout(resolve,100));}console.log("\u2705 Batch tamamland\u0131: Q=".concat(currentQ,", T=").concat(currentT,", P=0"));// Parti bitti: Q > 0 ise yeni parti; deƒüilse P = 0 ve dur
if(currentQ>0){console.log("\uD83D\uDD04 Yeni parti ba\u015Fl\u0131yor: Q=".concat(currentQ));}}// Final durumu
setP(0);setIsProcessing(false);// ƒ∞≈ülem kilidi kaldƒ±r
const after={Q:currentQ,P:0,T:currentT,offline};logAction('Kuyruƒüu ƒ∞≈üle - Tamamlandƒ±',before,after);// Kuyruƒüu temizle
if(offlineQueue){await offlineQueue.clearQueue();await updateQueueItems();}toast.success("\uD83C\uDF89 Kuyruk i\u015Flendi: ".concat(currentT-before.T," ba\u015Far\u0131l\u0131"));eventBus.emit('queue:result',{ok:currentT-before.T,fail:0});}catch(error){setP(0);setIsProcessing(false);// ƒ∞≈ülem kilidi kaldƒ±r
toast.error('‚ùå Kuyruk i≈üleme hatasƒ±');console.error('Kuyruk i≈üleme hatasƒ±:',error);}};// üîÑ 4) Kuyruƒüu Temizle (onaydan sonra)
const clearQueue=async()=>{if(!checkDebounce())return;console.log("\uD83D\uDD04 Kuyru\u011Fu Temizle clicked: offline=".concat(offline,", Q=").concat(Q,", P=").concat(P,", T=").concat(T));if(Q===0){console.log('üö´ Kuyruƒüu Temizle blocked: Q=0');toast.info('‚ÑπÔ∏è Kuyruk zaten bo≈ü');return;}const before={Q,P,T,offline};if(P===0){// P = 0 ise: Q = 0
setQ(0);// Kuyruƒüu temizle
if(offlineQueue){await offlineQueue.clearQueue();await updateQueueItems();}const after={Q:0,P,T,offline};// T hi√ßbir ko≈üulda deƒüi≈ümez
logAction('Kuyruƒüu Temizle',before,after);toast.success("\uD83D\uDDD1\uFE0F Kuyruk temizlendi (".concat(before.Q," kay\u0131t)"));}else{// P > 0 ise: √∂nce i≈ülemi iptal et ‚Üí P = 0, sonra Q = 0
setP(0);// ƒ∞≈ülemi iptal et
setQ(0);// Kuyruƒüu temizle
if(offlineQueue){await offlineQueue.clearQueue();await updateQueueItems();}const after={Q:0,P:0,T,offline};// T hi√ßbir ko≈üulda deƒüi≈ümez
logAction('Kuyruƒüu Temizle (ƒ∞≈ülem ƒ∞ptal)',before,after);toast.success("\uD83D\uDED1 \u0130\u015Flem durduruldu ve kuyruk temizlendi (".concat(before.Q," kay\u0131t)"));}};const updateQueueItems=async()=>{if(offlineQueue){const items=await offlineQueue.getQueue();setQueueItems(items);if(onUpdate)onUpdate();}};// Initialization - saya√ßlarƒ± senkronize et
useEffect(()=>{const initializeCounters=async()=>{if(offlineQueue){// Q: Kuyruk sayƒ±sƒ±
const queue=await offlineQueue.getQueue();setQ(queue.length);setQueueItems(queue);// T: 24 saat toplam (localStorage'dan al)
const stored24h=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('24h_records')||'[]');setT(stored24h.length);// P: Ba≈ülangƒ±√ßta 0
setP(0);console.log("\uD83D\uDD04 Initialized: Q=".concat(queue.length,", P=0, T=").concat(stored24h.length,", offline=").concat(offline));}};initializeCounters();},[offlineQueue]);// 24 saatlik toplama ekleme (T artƒ±rmak i√ßin)
const add24hTotal=function(){let count=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;// Timestamp'li kayƒ±t tut (rolling window i√ßin)
const now=new Date().toISOString();const records=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('24h_records')||'[]');for(let i=0;i<count;i++){records.push({timestamp:now});}// 24 saatten eski kayƒ±tlarƒ± temizle
const oneDayAgo=new Date(Date.now()-24*60*60*1000).toISOString();const filteredRecords=records.filter(record=>record.timestamp>oneDayAgo);localStorage.setItem('24h_records',JSON.stringify(filteredRecords));};// Render logu - her render'da
